title: Senior Engineer
description:
**Petrofac is a leading international service provider to the energy industry, with a diverse client portfolio including many of the world’s leading energy companies.**



We design, build, manage and maintain infrastructure for our clients. We recruit, reward, and develop our people based on merit regardless of race, nationality, religion, gender, age, sexual orientation, marital status or disability. We value our people and treat everyone who works for or with Petrofac fairly and without discrimination.



The world is re-thinking its energy supply and energy security needs, planning for a phased transition to alternative energy sources. We are here to help our clients meet these evolving energy needs.



This is an exciting time to join us on this journey.

  



We support flexible working requests and have adopted a hybrid approach for most of our office-based roles. We ask employees to be present in the office at least three days per week.

  


***Are you ready to bring the right energy to Petrofac and help us deliver a better future for everyone?***

  

**JOB TITLE: Senior Engineer-Onshore Pipeline**


**KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:**


* A fully competent onshore Pipeline engineer who can work independently, or as part of a project leading a team of engineers and designers.


* Review and Preparation Material Take-off & Construction BOQ and ensure that the correct material is ordered as per schedule.
* Review and Preparation of Pipeline Material Specification, Datasheets, RFQs, Technical Bid Evaluations, (TBE) & Vendor Document/Drawing Reviews for all pipeline components.


* Familiar with all pipeline components including Line pipe, Hot induction bends, Cold field bends, Pipeline Ball Valves, Insulating Joints, Barred Tee, Anchor Flanges, Pig Signallers, Pig Traps, Coating & Lining materials, and Field Joint coating.


* Performing Pipeline Design Specifications, Mechanical Design Calculations like Pipeline Wall Thickness, Road Crossings, Buoyancy, Anchor force, Upheaval Buckling, Hydrostatic pressure etc.
* Understand the Pipeline Route Layout Drawings, Pipeline Alignment Sheets and Isometric Drawings for Launcher/Receiver Area, Approach Area, Pumping Stations, Compressor Stations, Sectionalizing Valve Stations, Well heads, Manifolds, etc.


* Software Knowledge in AutoCAD/MicroStation, CAESAR-II/ Auto PIPE, and ArcGIS/Google Earth


* Planning of man hours, resources and organize the preparation of the Technical Document Register (TDR).


* Field Engineering support activities for site queries.


**ESSENTIAL QUALIFICATIONS AND SKILLS:**


* Bachelors or Master’s degree in Engineering (Mechanical /Pipeline)


* Minimum 10+ years of accomplished experience in Pipeline engineering with Oil & Gas industry


* Experience of managing multiple activities including Material Engineering, Design calculations and Drawings for Pipeline engineering


* Strong leadership skills (proven success of leading people, ability to delegate and achieve results through teamwork)

title: Senior R&D Engineer
description:
**BU / FUNCTION DESCRIPTION**


TE Energy offers a wide range of reliable and cost-effective products for the electrical power industry. Our position as a leading supplier of electrical components enables us to design next-generation products. For over 60 years, we have worked closely with our customers around the globe to develop innovative solutions to ever-changing challenges, known under names such as Axicom, Bowthorpe EMP, Crompton Instruments, Raychem and Simel.


**ROLE OBJECTIVE**


The Senior Product engineer will report to the Supervisor, Product Design Engineering in Energy’s Bangalore Engineering Design Center team. The role will be responsible for Computer Aided design of products and sustaining engineering support for TE Energy products for LV, MV & HV applications and engineering support for existing products to sustain in the competitive market. The role will support one of TE Energy’s product lines including Solar Harness, Insulation & Protection, Connectors & fittings for LV, MV & HV applications.  



**Responsibilities:**
---------------------

  

* Assist in designing TE Energy products for LV, MV & HV applications using polymeric, insulating and metallic materials.
* Assist global team with sustaining and New Product Developments across a range of Energy engineering projects.
* Recording results of design reviews and design decision meetings and report writing.
* 3D CAD design using Creo/Pro-E & 2D CAD design
* Product Data management using Windchill PDMLink
* Assess drawings & calculate the tolerance based on Stack-up analysis, process-based tolerance & referring to standards.
* Prepare design verification test plans, leading Design FMEAs.
* Work on product testing, qualification & Work with supplier for DFM & design reviews.
* Designing molds for prototypes & design of jigs & fixtures for product testing.
* Be a strong technical partner and provide support to Product management teams. Attend/support customer design review meetings, technology days etc..
* Executing on cost optimization/reduction (VA/VE) opportunities for the business.
* Reverse Engineering of competitor products.

**Desired Candidate Profile:**
------------------------------

  

**EDUCATION/KNOWLEDGE**


* Mechanical Engineering Degree (OR Industrial Production) or higher.
* >8 years of product development experience in Energy Domain
* Experience in product design of Energy domain products (Overhead connectors, cable accessories, Solar connectors, Joints/Splices, Terminations Switchgear connect, Insulators, Surge arrestors, HVCS, etc.)
* Solid knowledge of Metal Casting Process, Metal Fabrication Processes, Plastic/rubber components, e.g. thermoset molding or rubber molding
* LDFSS or DMAIC 6-sigma green or black belt certification an advantage.
* Organized, methodical and self-motivated individual with the ability to work independently on own initiative and meet own commitments is essential.


**CRITICAL EXPERIENCE**


* Energy domain strong product technical expertise.
* Strong customer service mindset, delivering quality products and services on time
* Fluent communication skills, facilitating collaboration with own team, customers, internal business leaders and technology leaders to create value.
* Individual, have strong planning skills and be able to deal with multiple competing priorities.


**COMPETENCIES**  

* Excellent motivational skills: a person with the ability to achieve goals and the highest standards of performance in a dynamic fast paced environment.
* Attention to detail and on time delivery.
* Excellent executor, timely and high-quality decision-making skills
* Clear, strategic thinker with the ability to identify, analyze, and solve complex problems.
  

**Competencies**
----------------


Values: Integrity, Accountability, Inclusion, Innovation, Teamwork**ABOUT TE CONNECTIVITY**  

TE Connectivity is a global technology leader enabling a secure, sustainable, productive, and connected future. Our broad range of connectivity and sensor solutions have been proven in the most demanding environments, enabling advancements in transportation, industrial applications, medical technology, energy technology, data communications, and for the home. With more than 85,000 employees, including more than 7,500 engineers, we work with customers in nearly 140 countries. TE ensures that EVERY CONNECTION COUNTS.

  


**WHAT TE CONNECTIVITY OFFERS:**  

We are pleased to offer you an exciting total package that can also be flexibly adapted to changing life situations - the well-being of our employees is our top priority!


* Competitive Salary Package
* Performance-Based Bonus Plans
* Health and Wellness Incentives
* Employee Stock Purchase Program
* Community Outreach Programs / Charity Events
* Employee Resource Group


Across our global sites and business units, we put together packages of benefits that are either supported by TE itself or provided by external service providers. In principle, the benefits offered can vary from site to site.

title: Senior Project Manager
description:
About Company:
Thermo Fisher Scientific Inc. (NYSE: TMO) is the world leader in serving science, with annual revenue of approximately $40 billion. Our Mission is to enable our customers to make the world healthier, cleaner and safer. While our customers are accelerating life sciences research, solving sophisticated analytical challenges, growing efficiency in their laboratories, improving patient health through diagnostics or the development and manufacture of life-changing therapies, we are here to support them. Our global distributed team delivers an outstanding combination of innovative technologies, purchasing convenience and pharmaceutical services through our industry-leading brands, including Thermo Scientific, Applied Biosystems, Invitrogen, Fisher Scientific, Unity Lab Services, Patheon and PPD.


Roles & Responsibilities:
Responsible for driving cost out opportunity to build a pipeline, developing design concepts and supporting with building cost out standard works in the capacity of a Packaging Engineer

* Lead, design, and qualify the packaging design for Laboratory products Division and Analytical Instruments Group which are globally manufactured and help to reduce the cost, drive design standardization across multiple sites and look for driving sustainable/green packaging solution.
* As part of a multi-functional development team, major responsibility will include leading high sophisticated Packaging projects independently.
* Strong Industrial packaging design knowledge, global qualification standards and exposure towards sustainable packaging.
* Ensures that assigned projects are delivered timely, to specification, and at or below targeted cost through validated engineering plans, including quality, cost, schedule, and risk assessment. Report on project progress.
* Approaches problems in a rational manner and with outstanding tools to ensure comprehensive understanding and effective resolution.
* Promotes an environment of learning, coordinates technical training, addresses, and fills technical gaps, and helps to buildup technical pipeline.
* Efficiently interfaces to sourcing, operations, quality, logistic, service, and global R&D team, as well as external suppliers, vendors, and customers.
* Collaborate with multiple cross functional teams to propose; assess the feasibility, and implement packaging design, material, or process changes, including creative packaging solutions to drive cost out and sustainability.
* Perform cost benefit analysis and finalize annualized savings for given project.
* Perform VAVE study and identify cost out opportunities which are quality neutral.


Skills and Proficiencies:* Bachelor’s degree in mechanical engineering with 8+ years of experience
* VAVE certified & PMP certified (Good to have)
* Minimum 5 end-to-end high sophisticated project execution experience in the role of project leader.
* Excellent understanding of packaging design (Foams, Corrugates, Paper boards, Wood, and polymer films)
* Awareness on regulatory requirements. Knowledge of packaging test standards such as ISTA, ISO and ASTM.
* Proficient with phase gate / technical review process
* Problem solving, critical thinking, attention to detail, responsibility and out of box thinking.

title: Senior Engineer
description:
**Date:** Mar 6, 2024


**Location:** Chennai, TN, IN, 600113


**Company:** Hubbell Incorporated


**Brand Overview**
------------------

  

Hubbell Incorporated was founded in 1888 and has grown into an international manufacturer of quality electrical, lighting and power solutions with more than 75 brands used and recognized around the world. Our founder, Harvey Hubbell, developed tooling and equipment to serve the growing demand for new assembly and manufacturing machinery during the industrial revolution. An early, and one of many patents awarded, came for the creation of the first practical method to control electricity through the pull chain socket that remains unchanged today. As a market leader in reliable, electrical solutions, we provide more than half a million products delivered through our various business groups. Hubbell is committed to continually innovating solutions that work, transforming old products with new ideas, and ensuring that we Energize, Enlighten and Empower the communities that support us.  

  

India Operations  

  

BURNDY Technology and Global Business Services Private Limited (HUBBELL INDIA) is a wholly owned subsidiary of Hubbell Inc. Hubbell India provides Engineering Services, Business Solutions and IT Services. Hubbell Engineering located in Ascendas, ITPL,Chennai, is engaged in the business of computer aided design and engineering services. The Hubbell Business Solutions functions at Infopark Kochi, provide superior business intelligence, knowledge services and business process solutions across Hubbell divisions and Corporate. IT Services team is spread across Chennai and Kochi.  

  

Hubbell Electrical Products LLP located in Chennai is poised to assist with part and product manufacturing for all Hubbell Business units
**Posting Address**
-------------------

  

Burndy Technology & Global Business Services Pvt Ltd  

13th Floor, Zenith (Phase 3)  

International Tech Park ,CSIR Road  

Taramani, Chennai ,Tamil Nadu -600113
**Position Overview**
---------------------

  

We are looking for an Electro-mechanical Engineer who is good in basics of electrical engineering concepts and expertise in design and development of medium voltage protection and switching product line
**Duties and Responsibilities**
-------------------------------

  

* Interact with US clients to understand and gather project requirements.
* Lead design & development of Overhead medium voltage protection system/ sub-system as per marketing requirements.
* Research, review, and implement best-practices, new and emerging technologies, and design patterns to new and existing development.
* Generate conceptual 3D design, engineering calculations and detailed design for extensive range of electro-mechanical products using Autodesk Inventor.
* Converting the ideas into practically feasible product-oriented design.
* Validate the conceptual design integrity using FEA analysis.
* Deliver complete and accurate detailed design drawings as required for part manufacturing with GD&T.
* Create Drawings based on ASME Y14.5M – 1994 standards.
* Support for the electrical product testing with respect to IEEE standards.
* Generate documentation including design spec, part drawings, engineering bill of materials and assembly drawing per Hubbell standard.
* Working knowledge in Vault and SAP based engineering change management process.
* Knowledge on DFM and DFA is an added advantage.
**Skills and Experience**
-------------------------

  

Experience: Mandatory: Minimum 4 years’ experience in electrical industry dealing with medium voltage protection and switching products. Desired: Experience in independently leading a large size switchgear project from scratch to launch.
Software skills: Mandatory: Must have working knowledge in all the features of Autodesk Inventor & AutoCAD. Desired: Working knowledge in FEA software Ansys or COMSOL and PLM vault is desirable  


**Desired Skills:**
* Sound knowledge in designing medium voltage disconnecting switches and load break switches.
* Hands on experience in fault current interrupting products such as VCB/ACB or recloser or circuit breaker or fusing product design (any one preferred).
* Hands on experience in designing latch-based holding & actuating mechanism for VCB/ACB/recloser/capacitor switches (any one preferred).
* Knowledge in arc plasma physics and its interruption
* Knowledge in electro-mechanical and electro-magnetic assemblies.
* Basic knowledge in magnetics design & selection of electro-mechanical actuators like solenoids & Ct’s or transformers.
* Basic experience in fault breaking test, di-electric testing, short time withstand current test and its result interpretation.
**Education**
-------------


Masters Degree
Bachelors Degree in Electrical Engineering**Relevant Industries**
-----------------------


Power

title: Test Engineer
description:
**Job description**

Job Title: Quality Control Engineer

Department: Quality Assurance

Location: Madipakkam, Chennai

Reports To: Quality Control Manager

Job Summary:

The Quality Control Engineer plays a crucial role in ensuring the quality and reliability of products through the development and implementation of quality control processes and procedures. They will be responsible for monitoring production processes, conducting inspections, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to identify and resolve quality issues. The Quality Control Engineer will also contribute to the continuous improvement of product quality and process efficiency.

Key Responsibilities:

1. Inspection and Testing:

- Perform detailed inspections of raw materials, components, and finished products to ensure they meet established quality standards.

- Conduct product testing and measurements using various tools and equipment.

- Maintain accurate records of inspection and test results.

2. Process Monitoring:

- Continuously monitor and analyze production processes to identify opportunities for improvement.

- Collaborate with production teams to implement corrective actions and preventive measures to ensure product quality.

3. Documentation and Reporting:

- Create and maintain quality control documentation, including inspection procedures and reports.

- Generate regular quality reports for management and cross-functional teams.

- Document non-conformance issues and work with relevant teams to resolve them.

4. Root Cause Analysis:

- Investigate and analyze the root causes of quality issues and defects.

- Develop and implement corrective action plans to prevent recurrence.

5. Supplier Quality:

- Evaluate and audit supplier quality performance.

- Work with suppliers to address quality concerns and drive improvements in the supply chain.

6. Training and Development:

- Provide training to production personnel on quality control procedures and standards.

- Stay updated on industry best practices and emerging quality control technologies.

7. Continuous Improvement:

- Actively participate in continuous improvement initiatives, such as Lean Six Sigma, to enhance product quality and process efficiency.

8. Compliance:

- Ensure compliance with industry regulations and quality standards (e.g., ISO, FDA, etc.).

- Participate in internal and external quality audits.

Qualifications:

- Bachelor's degree in engineering or a related field (e.g., mechanical, electrical, industrial engineering).

- Previous experience in quality control or quality assurance roles is preferred.

- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

- Knowledge of quality control tools and methodologies (e.g., Six Sigma, Statistical Process Control).

- Proficiency in using measurement and testing equipment.

- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.

- Attention to detail and a commitment to accuracy.

- Ability to work effectively in a team and independently.

Preferred Skills:

- Certification in quality control or quality assurance (e.g., Certified Quality Engineer - CQE).

- Experience with quality management software and tools.

- Knowledge of relevant industry-specific quality standards.

For info: www.etiicos.com

RajMall Inventives (Etiicos) is an equal opportunity employer and encourages individuals of all backgrounds to apply. We are committed to providing a safe and healthy work environment. All employees are expected to adhere to safety policies and procedures and contribute to a culture of safety and continuous improvement

title: Project Engineer
description:
**Job Description: Project Engineer**

We are seeking a dedicated and skilled Project Engineer to join our dynamic team. The Project Engineer will play a crucial role in planning, executing, and completing various engineering projects within our organization. This role involves coordinating and collaborating with cross-functional teams, ensuring project timelines, budgets, and quality standards are met, and contributing to the successful delivery of projects.

**Key Responsibilities:**

**1.** **Project Planning and Cordination:**

a. Collaborate with project stakeholders to define project scope, objectives, and requirements.

b. Develop detailed project plans, including timelines, milestones, and resource allocation.

c. Coordinate with various teams, including design, procurement, construction, and quality assurance, to ensure smooth project execution.

d. Identify potential risks and develop mitigation strategies to minimize project disruptions.

**2.** **Technical Expertise:**

a. Provide technical input and guidance throughout the project lifecycle.

b. Review and analyse project designs, specifications, and drawings to ensure compliance with industry standards and project requirements.

c. Collaborate with design teams to optimize project designs for efficiency and cost-effectiveness.

d. Stay updated on industry trends, technological advancements, and best practices to enhance project outcomes.

**3.** **Budget and Resource Management:**

a. Monitor project budgets, expenses, and resource utilization to ensure adherence to financial constraints.

b. Identify opportunities for cost savings without compromising project quality.

c. Work closely with procurement to source necessary materials, equipment, and services in a timely manner.

**4.** **Quality Assurance:**

a. Implement quality control procedures to maintain project deliverables' high standard.

b. Perform regular inspections and quality checks to identify and address any deviations from specifications.

c. Collaborate with quality assurance teams to conduct necessary testing and validation activities.

**5.** **Communication and Reporting:**

a. Maintain clear and consistent communication with project stakeholders, including clients, team members, and management.

b. Provide regular project status updates, reports, and presentations detailing progress, challenges, and solutions.

c. Address any concerns or inquiries from stakeholders promptly and professionally.

**6.** **Health Safety and Environment Compliance:**

a. Ensure all project activities adhere to relevant health, safety, and environmental regulations.

b. Identify potential hazards and develop safety protocols to minimize risks to personnel and the environment.

c. Collaborate with safety officers to conduct safety assessments and implement necessary measures.

**Qualification and Requirements:**

a. Bachelor's degree in Engineering (Civil, Mechanical, Electrical, or related field).

b. Proven experience as a Project Engineer or similar role in engineering project management.

c. Strong understanding of engineering principles, project management methodologies, and industry standards.

d. Proficient in project management software tools and Microsoft Office Suite.

e. Excellent communication, leadership, and teamwork skills.

f. Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.

g. Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and prioritize tasks effectively.

h. Knowledge of relevant health, safety, and environmental regulations.

**Preferred Qualification:**

a. Professional Engineer (PE) certification.

b. Master's degree in Engineering or Project Management.

c. Experience with relevant project management software (e.g., Microsoft Project).

d. Familiarity with codes, regulations, and permitting processes.

e. Previous experience in a construction/manufacturing/mechanical environment.

**Location: Raipur and Ranchi**

If you are a dedicated and proactive engineering professional with a passion for delivering successful projects on time and within budget, we invite you to apply for.

Job Types: Full-time, Permanent

title: Engineer
description:
**MEP Engineer Roles and Responsibilities**  
Working as part of the project management team, reporting to the Project Director, MEP Engineer is responsible for all aspects of the project relating to building services.  
The MEP engineer job description includes the management of the MEP team to ensure that the day-to-day duties are performed professionally and expeditiously to support the ongoing progress of the project.  
The MEP team on site consists of the Lead Mechanical (MEP) Engineer, Electrical Engineer, and MEP Inspectors.  
MEP consulting services are the key requirements of construction-related projects. No matter if you are an architect, an owner of a building project, or an engineer; these services will make a difference in the value of the project. As a consulting firm, MEP consultants offer efficient services as compared to individual advisors.  
Mechanical, Electrical, and Plumbing needs are the fundamental requirements of modern construction projects. Hiring an experienced MEP advisor can make a huge difference to meet the expected value of a project. The services of an MEP advisor must meet the following criteria to help you meet the required quality of a project.

title: Application Developer
description:
**Job Summary**


Primarily the Associate Applications Engineer will assist global customers to identify / verify their requirements and specifications and will prepare competitive costings / quotations / tenders that are both technically and commercially accurate, in accordance with Company policies and procedures. The incumbent will interface with both Customers and internal stakeholders including Sales, Engineering and Design to provide support and solutions that meet the needs and expectations of Customers, strengthening relationships and positively impacting the opportunity to win orders globally for Celeros ClydeUnion Pump product line. This position will be based in Bangalore and will support the global teams

 **Principle Duties and Responsibilities**

* Liaises with Sales on the Customer's requirements and specifications, including the scope, and timing.
* Reviews the RFP (Request for Proposal) / tender document to ensure the contractual requirements are adequately defined and determines the Company’s capability to meet the specified requirements.
* Prepares and submits the techno-commercial offer to Sales as per the offer submission schedule.
* Reviews and evaluates the detailed technical specifications for packaged equipment, extracts applicable Customer requirements and translates / communicates the same to sub-contractors, sub-vendors and internal stakeholders.
* Obtains quotations for relevant bought-in equipment in accordance with the applicable Supply Chain policies and procedures.
* Performs a technical and commercial evaluation of the sub-suppliers’ quotations (for the major critical components / items) to ensure the quote / scope is in compliance with the Customers’ requirements / specifications.
* Develops and submits a detailed proposal to the Customer in accordance with the applicable Tendering Policies and Procedures (ITO - Inquiry to Order).
* Ensures the CPQ tender data and tendering front log are accurately completed and actively managed.
* Provides ongoing technical and commercial clarifications as requested by the Customer and internal stakeholders to support successful order placement.
* Provides tendering support to regional tendering and sales teams for win order strategies across the product lines to ensure all activities occur on time and with high quality from proposal receipt to handover.
* Supports with Customer visits during bid clarification / negotiation stages.
* Works as a member of the Global Tendering Team to ensure KPI’s and Metrics are achieved.

 **Knowledge, Skills and Abilities**

* Expert technical knowledge with API multistage Centrifugal Pump and the systems they go in.
* A strong commercial focus and negotiation skill.
* Positively establishes relationships across multiple locations and copes well with working remotely from the team and other departments.
* Responds professionally to all inquiries and remains calm and composed when under pressure.
* Is well organized, structured and methodical.
* Displays exceptional attention to detail and accuracy, even when handling multiple demands.
* Has a proven track record of meeting deadlines while maintaining high performance standards.
* Is a team player: committed, reliable, responsible, flexible, helpful, supportive, active listener/ communicator.

 **Education and Experience**

* B.E in Mechanical Engineering in full time/ regular course from recognized Institute and university.
* 2-5 experience as application engineer for API Pumps, preferably in multistage centrifugal pump in Product or EPC MNCs
* Experience in reviewing highly detailed specifications and writing comprehensive and accurate bids
* Essential knowledge and experience in reviewing highly detailed specifications and writing comprehensive and accurate bids
* Experience in the oil & gas / power & energy / industrial market is mandatory
* Strong knowledge of Microsoft packages including Word, Excel and PowerPoint

title: Technical Support Engineer
description:
**Full time** **|** **3Ding** **|** **India**
---------------------------------------------

###### **Posted On 21/11/2022**

### **Job Description**


3Ding manufactures & supplies 3D Printers all over India. 3Ding is looking for Young Engineers *with* backgrounds in Electronics/Mechanics *with* problem solving skills to debug & solve problems arising in 3D Printers. *With* 3D Printing being a futuristic technology, working at 3Ding offers you a challenging role also establishing a great career path.  

  

  

Interview will be technically challenging. If you want a cushy *job,* please skip applying.  

  

  

Job Responsibilities involve..  

  

  

* Working *with* problematic machines (both internal & clients), debugging & resolving them fast - issues can be mechanical, electrical, electronics or software.
  
* Should possess good written and verbal communication skills to interact *with* clients professionally.
  
* Helping novice clients understand the technology & getting them started
* Filing reports about the issues faced by customer and update the R&D team *with* customer feedback.
  
* Staying up to date *with* current trends & competition in the industry.
  
* Should be able to *work* in a multidisciplinary team and should be flexible to *work* on weekends, when required.
  
* Document troubleshooting and problem resolution steps for easiness of the end users.
  
* Travel to client locations when required for installation, training & support whenever required.
  

  

3Ding | Reddx Technologies Pvt Ltd. | www.3Ding.in/careers  

  

  

### **Requirements**


* Candidates MUST be *from* Chennai (preferably in 15 mins radius of Ambattur)
* Male Candidates are preferred for this job.
  
* Bachelor's Degree in Electrical/Electronics/Mechatronics Engineering or similar can apply.
  
* Experience of 1-2 years in the field of technical support will be a big plus.
  
* Freshers *with* good communication skills, ability to grasp things quickly and effectively can apply.
  
* Communication is the key - Excellent Oral & written (email) communication is a must.
  
* Being Confident adds value.
  
* Additional Technical background adds value.
  
* Should be able to *work* without monitoring.
  

  

  

### **Benefits**


Working in a startup has it's pros -
  

* Challenging *work* & faster growth opportunities compared to larger corporates.
* Less hierarchy & hence your ideas will be heard.
* Being in technical support, you'll get chances to visit new places & connect *with* different kinds of people, including industry experts.
* The 3D Printing industry is massive - economists predicts this industry as a next trillion dollar Industry.
* A very steep learning curve.
* Health Insurance Coverage.

Manufacturing


*Work* Experience

12000-15000 Per Month, Revisable after a probation of 3 months

Chennai,

title: Senior Engineer
description:
**In this Role, Your Responsibilities Will Be:**

* You should be able to sub-lead Digital Twin projects.
* Modeling, testing & tuning of assigned systems/sub-systems within agreed Project budget & schedule.
* Prepare, review & submit the Data Collection List as per Project scope to Project Lead.
* Prepare, review & submit Functional Design Specification (FDS) to Project Lead
* Review Marked-up P&ID's as per the project scope & submit to lead
* Support Pre-Factory Acceptance Test and Factory Acceptance Test in India or at any overseas location and fulfill the customer requirement as per the scope for the projects.
* Follow the Department Quality procedures during various stages of projects & Fill-up all the quality related checklists for the assigned system/sub-system on regular basis.
* Prepare & review the systems for Expert Review and Model standalone test.
* Take the lead in integrating all the systems/sub-systems for testing.
* Work closely with Global modeling team and extend support if required.
* Perform work within established budgetary and schedule requirements.
* Perform other duties as assigned time to time.
* Work in a simulator project with a team of 4-5 engineers.
* Understanding Ovation Control system
* Learn new skills as per the department’s requirement.
* Understanding Ovation Control system, protections, interlocks and permissives
**Who You Are:**  

You quickly and decisively takes action in fast-changing, unpredictable situations. You shows a tremendous amount of initiative in tough situations. You sets aggressive goals and has high standards. You pursues everything with energy, drive and the need to finish. You always keeps the end in sight and puts in extra effort to meet deadlines. You delivers messages in a clear, compelling and concise manner. You actively listens and checks for understanding. You focuses on highest priorities and sets aside less critical tasks. Lays out a thorough schedule and steps for achieving objectives.  

  

**For This Role, You Will Need:*** Bachelor’s / Master’s degree in Mechanical Engineering / Power Plant Engineering with 5-7 years of experience in Coal / Combined Cycle Power Plant operation/modeling
* Strong computer skills
* Minimum English language skills - speaking and writing
* Should have the creativity to apply knowledge in thermodynamics to design systems.
* Able to work in a team
* Able to travel and work abroad 50% of work time
**Preferred Qualifications that Set You Apart:*** Any previous work experience with Simulation/Modeling tools
* Good knowledge of Power Plant process and operation.
* Excellent Communication Skills
**Our Offer To You:**  

By joining Emerson, you will be given the opportunity to make a difference through the work you do.
Emerson's compensation and benefits programs are designed to be **competitive within the industry and local labor markets** . We also offer a **comprehensive medical and insurance coverage** to meet the needs of our employees.


We are committed to creating a global workplace that **supports diversity, equity and embraces inclusion** . We welcome foreign nationals to join us through our **Work Authorization Sponsorship** .


We attract, develop, and retain exceptional people in an inclusive environment, where all **employees can reach their greatest potential** . We are dedicated to the ongoing development of our employees because we know that it is critical to our success as a global company.


We have established our Remote Work Policy for eligible roles to promote **Work-Life Balance** through a hybrid work set up where our team members can take advantage of working both from home and at the office.


Safety is paramount to us, and we are relentless in our pursuit to provide a **Safe Working Environment** across our global network and facilities.


Through our benefits, development opportunities, and an inclusive and safe work environment, we aim to create an organization our people are proud to represent.


**Our Commitment to Diversity, Equity & Inclusion**

At Emerson, we are committed to fostering a culture where every employee is valued and respected for their unique experiences and perspectives. We believe a diverse and inclusive work environment contributes to the rich exchange of ideas and diversity of thoughts, that inspires innovation and brings the best solutions to our customers.


This philosophy is fundamental to living our company’s values and our responsibility to leave the world in a better place. Learn more about our Culture & Values and about Diversity, Equity & Inclusion at Emerson .


**WHY EMERSON**

**Our Commitment to Our People**

At Emerson, we are motivated by a spirit of collaboration that helps our diverse, multicultural teams across the world drive innovation that makes the world healthier, safer, smarter, and more sustainable. And we want you to join us in our bold aspiration.


We have built an engaged community of inquisitive, dedicated people who thrive knowing they are welcomed, trusted, celebrated, and empowered to solve the world’s most complex problems — for our customers, our communities, and the planet. You’ll contribute to this vital work while further developing your skills through our award-winning employee development programs. We are a proud corporate citizen in every city where we operate and are committed to our people, our communities, and the world at large. We take this responsibility seriously and strive to make a positive impact through every endeavor.


At Emerson, you’ll see firsthand that our people are at the center of everything we do. So, let’s go. Let’s think differently. Learn, collaborate, and grow. Seek opportunity. Push boundaries. Be empowered to make things better. Speed up to break through. Let’s go, together.


**ABOUT EMERSON**

Emerson is a global leader in automation technology and software. Through our deep domain expertise and legacy of flawless execution, Emerson helps customers in critical industries like life sciences, energy, power and renewables, chemical and advanced factory automation operate more sustainably while improving productivity, energy security and reliability.


With global operations and a comprehensive portfolio of software and technology, we are helping companies implement digital transformation to measurably improve their operations, conserve valuable resources and enhance their safety.


We offer equitable opportunities, celebrate diversity, and embrace challenges with confidence that, together, we can make an impact across a broad spectrum of countries and industries. Whether you’re an established professional looking for a career change, an undergraduate student exploring possibilities, or a recent graduate with an advanced degree, you’ll find your chance to make a difference with Emerson. Join our team – let’s go!

title: Technical Project Manager
description:
### **Job Title**


Technical Project Manager### **Job Description**

**Job Description**

**In this role, you have the opportunity to**


The Technical Project Manager is part of global organization that delivers impact to multiple businesses within Philips. The role manages high impact, complex transfer projects that enables Philips to reduce risk, improve profitability, align with Philips’ strategic supply base and optimize supply chain flexibility. The primary function within this role is to execute fast-paced, high quality transfer projects and drive technical ideation of productivity projects working with R&D, PE & CM counterparts.


Responsible for driving Supplier Transfer projects , Productivity projects & Obsolesence / sustaining projects and achieving project objectives, balancing schedule, cost, quality and requirements during each IL phases by working with different stakeholders and leading and directing teams.


Delivering BOM productivity projects in service across all BU's

**You are responsible for**

* Leading the execution of large-scale projects that drive global sourcing strategies to deliver the strategic business initiatives. This includes supplier management, E2E product launch management, lifecycle management among other critical sustaining engineering activities.
* Responsible for creating E2E engineering release schedule to qualify products with new suppliers & release to production – this is the most critical aspect of the job responsibility & project management excellence is critical for success.
* Accountable for resolving all technical challenges during the transfer process, which includes resolving product specification challenges, consulting with subject matter experts to guide suppliers, reverse engineering, driving design review workshops, develop test fixtures, etc.
* Accountable for supplier quality performance in assigned projects to improve existing benchmarks and developing improvement plans to ensure Supply Chain target performance levels are achieved.
* Responsible to ensure product requirements are fully defined to enhance quality through transfer projects, this would involve reverse engineering as needed.
* Full responsibility to achieve critical KPIs for QUALITY and productivity targets that are tied to the annual business plans.
* Partner with key business stakeholders to ensure that all business needs are met & improved through sourcing/concept projects.

**You are a part of**


A high-impact, global organization within Philips that works across all modalities – The Sustaining Engineering Team (STET). STET has been established as an entrepreneurial organization that focuses on fast paced, high-quality portfolio transfers within the Philips global supply base to mitigate risk & maximize profitability. As a Technical project manager within this team, the project manager is responsible for driving technical excellence within said projects to ensure first-time-right quality.

**To succeed in this role, you should have the following skills and experience**

* Bachelor’s degree in Mechanical or Electrical Engineering.Master’s degree preferred.
* 8+ years’ experience in a high-tech industry with a focus on working with suppliers for design changes & product launches
* PMP certification is preferred
* Managed NPI, Supplier transfers, Component transfers, etc.,
* MS projects / Ariba systems, / SAP project management or equivalent PM tools experience
* Knowledge of components and value engineering, DFx, workshop
* Project charter preparation
* Business case creation with Pay back / ROI
* Experience with cost engineering and management.
* Strong project management skills is a must with ability to lead teams and influence cross-functional stakeholders
* Excellent presentation, communication, and negotiation skills, across functions and organizational layers; proven ability to manage relationships at all org levels.
* Knowing and understanding broad business perspective.
* Knowledge of Supply management strategies and tools.
* Demonstrated ability in working in a complex/global environment.
* Independent worker in time and place
* Confident, Mature, calm, professional manner
* Flexible and adaptable
* Assertive, Pro-active: Take the lead/initiative
* Customer focused, Stress resistant
* Creative / Improviser, Supportive and Service minded
* Accuracy and attention to details, Solution oriented, problem solver
* Strong communication skills, Good listener & Capacity to influence
* Ability to plan and anticipate for success, and predict likely issues
* Integrity • Accountable • Analytical and independent

**In return, we offer you**


Describe in two to three lines what tangible and intangible benefits the incumbent will gain in this role. Use our Employer Value Proposition (EVP) themes and information gathered in the RSM as input sources.

**Why should you join Philips?**


Working at Philips is more than a job. It’s a calling to create a healthier society through meaningful work, focused on improving 2.5 billion lives a year by delivering innovative solutions across the health continuum. Our people experience a variety of unexpected moments when their lives and careers come together in meaningful ways. Learn more by watching this video.


To find out more about what it’s like working for Philips at a personal level, visit the Working at Philips page on our career website, where you can read stories from our employee blog. Once there,you can also learn about our recruitment process, or find answers to some of the frequently asked questions.


#LI-PHILIN

**#DIW**

title: Junior Engineer
description:
**Job Description Summary**
===========================


As part of the GE India Multi-modal Manufacturing team, Quality engineer is responsible for establishing an efficient and continually improving In-process quality systems as per AS 9100 / ISO 9001. This person will own developing and executing the MRB process & Need to handle MRB for the fabrication COE , in process quality inspections to address the key Quality deliverables in the project including analysis.**Job Description**
===================

**Essential Responsibilities:**

* The position will report to the Quality Manager
* Responsible to carry out control of inventory in MRB & drive improvement in cost of quality
* Responsible for daily management of CFT trolley for NC parts dispositions
* Work closely with CFT/ Quality system teams to develop and implement AS 9100 / NC management procedures : understand requirements for certification, timing, and own all improvement actions necessary to obtain certifications,
* Coordinate for Quality training needs. Facilitate, train, and coach cross-functional employees in the use of quality tools as appropriate
* Initiate the continual improvement through quality audit programs, through the assessment / screening of various sources of non-conformances and by driving the implementation or corrective actions identified through Root Cause Analysis for In process improvements.
* Develop & Monitor all quality parameters for in process & quality equipment’s. Implementation of a comprehensive communication plan to support the quality strategy and establish a climate that encourages an open communication for employees to exchange ideas / suggestions

 **Qualifications/Requirements:**

* Highest Levels of Personal Integrity and Safety Mindset.
* First Class Diploma in Mechanical Engineering.
* 2+ Years of Experience in Engineering industry (Fabrication / Aviation industry using NDT extensively) – with firsthand experience with a Quality Management system
* Working knowledge of AS 9100 & S1000 and its application in a complex business. Requirements of implementation.

 **Desired Characteristics:**

* Humble: respectful, receptive, agile, eager to learn
* Transparent: shares critical information, speaks with candor, contributes constructively
* Focused: quick learner, strategically prioritizes work, committed
* Leadership ability: strong communicator, decision-maker, collaborative
* Problem solver: analytical-minded, challenges existing processes, critical thinker
* Knowledge of Lean and Six Sigma Methodology
* Fluent in English and Hindi Language (Written and Spoken) Marathi Language Skills (Verbal & Written)

**Additional Information**
==========================

**Relocation Assistance Provided:** Yes

**To succeed in this role, you should have the following skills and experience**

* Bachelor’s degree in Mechanical or Electrical Engineering.Master’s degree preferred.
* 10+ years’ experience in a high-tech industry with a focus on working with suppliers for design changes & product launches
* PMP certification is preferred
* Managed NPI, Supplier transfers, Component transfers, etc.,
* MS projects / Ariba systems, / SAP project management or equivalent PM tools experience
* Knowledge of components and value engineering, DFx, workshop
* Project charter preparation
* Business case creation with Pay back / ROI
* Experience with cost engineering and management.
* Strong project management skills is a must with ability to lead teams and influence cross-functional stakeholders
* Excellent presentation, communication, and negotiation skills, across functions and organizational layers; proven ability to manage relationships at all org levels.
* Knowing and understanding broad business perspective.
* Knowledge of Supply management strategies and tools.
* Demonstrated ability in working in a complex/global environment.
* Independent worker in time and place
* Confident, Mature, calm, professional manner
* Flexible and adaptable
* Assertive, Pro-active: Take the lead/initiative
* Customer focused, Stress resistant
* Creative / Improviser, Supportive and Service minded
* Accuracy and attention to details, Solution oriented, problem solver
* Strong communication skills, Good listener & Capacity to influence
* Ability to plan and anticipate for success, and predict likely issues
* Integrity • Accountable • Analytical and independent

**In return, we offer you**


Describe in two to three lines what tangible and intangible benefits the incumbent will gain in this role. Use our Employer Value Proposition (EVP) themes and information gathered in the RSM as input sources.

**Why should you join Philips?**


Working at Philips is more than a job. It’s a calling to create a healthier society through meaningful work, focused on improving 2.5 billion lives a year by delivering innovative solutions across the health continuum. Our people experience a variety of unexpected moments when their lives and careers come together in meaningful ways. Learn more by watching this video.


To find out more about what it’s like working for Philips at a personal level, visit the Working at Philips page on our career website, where you can read stories from our employee blog. Once there,you can also learn about our recruitment process, or find answers to some of the frequently asked questions.

title: Mechanical Designer
description:
ABOUT US

**SuryaLogix is a product development company in the Field of renewables, working with cutting-edge technologies like IoT, AI, and Wireless Communication. We support and resolve our client’s pain points in Remote Monitoring and Management, Smart/Hybrid Controllers, Asset Management, SCADA, etc. We help optimize and digitalize green energy generation to increase ROI using our innovative products.**

**Note: Only a Mechanical Engineer we required.**

Website:- www.suryalogix.com

As per our discussion, the following is the job description of the Profile.

Position: Mechanical Design Engineer

Experience: 1 to 3 yrs.

Qualification: BE/ B Tech with Mechanical Background

Description:

We are seeking a skilled Mechanical Design Engineer with 1-3 years of experience, proficient in 3D and 2D modeling, and drafting, and knowledgeable in software such as AutoCAD, SolidWorks, Creo, and CATIA. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of industrial processes, vendor interaction, and experience with sheet metal design.

Responsibilities:

Utilize 3D and 2D modeling software, including AutoCAD, SolidWorks, Creo, and CATIA, to design and develop mechanical components and systems, with a focus on sheet metal.

Create detailed drawings, schematics, and models for manufacturing and assembly processes, ensuring accuracy and feasibility.

Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to ensure designs meet project requirements and specifications.

Engage in vendor interactions for sourcing materials, components, and services, maintaining relationships, and ensuring quality standards are met.

Provide technical support during the manufacturing and assembly phases, addressing any design-related issues that may arise and implementing solutions.

Travel occasionally for vendor visits, production oversight, and project meetings, as required.

Requirements:

Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering or related field.

1-3 years of experience in mechanical design, with proficiency in 3D and 2D modeling using AutoCAD, SolidWorks, Creo, and CATIA.

Strong industrial knowledge, including experience with sheet metal design and fabrication processes.

Demonstrated ability to interact with vendors, negotiate contracts, and ensure timely delivery of materials and components.

Willingness to travel occasionally for vendor visits and project-related activities.

Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written, with the ability to effectively collaborate with teams and convey technical information.

Detail-oriented with a focus on delivering high-quality work.

Problem-solving skills and ability to think creatively to overcome design challenges.

title: Instrumentation Engineer
description:
**Company Description**  

Dr. Reddy’s Laboratories Ltd. is a leading multinational pharmaceutical company based across global locations. Each of our 24,000 plus employees comes to work every day for one collective purpose: to accelerate access to affordable and innovative medicines because **Good Health Can’t Wait**.


We started in 1984 with a modest investment, 20 employees and a bold vision. Today, we have research and development centres, manufacturing facilities or a commercial presence in 66 countries.


For nearly four decades, we have stood for access, affordability and innovation based on the bedrock of deep science, progressive people practices and robust corporate governance. As the pharmaceutical industry evolves and undergoes disruption, we see an opportunity – to strengthen our core further (the next steps) and to build the future (the new bets).


‘The Next and the New’ is how we aim to continue to be the partner of choice – purpose-driven, future-ready and sustainable. Our aim is to reach over 1.5 Bn+ patients across the world by 2030 by growing our core businesses and building for the future with sustainability at the core of our purpose and strategy. Sustainability for us means operating in a manner that respects people, planet and purpose – helping us conserve precious resources, serve our patients, create value for stakeholders, give back to society, fulfil our potential and maintain our integrity and transparency


Dr Reddy’s maintains a work environment, free from discrimination and is an equal opportunity employer. We are committed to employ & nurture all qualified diverse workforce without regard to race, colour religion, nationality, sex, age, disability status, genetics, sexual orientation, gender expression, citizenship or any other characteristic or classification protected by applicable law(s) of the country we operate in. We treasure every talent, and recognize merit and diversity in our organization.

 **Job Description** **Job Summary** We are seeking a dynamic and experienced Instrumentation Engineer in Quality control for performing the Preventive maintenance, break downs overseeing technical evaluations, and ensuring adherence to safety standards in the implementation and maintenance of instrumentation and control systems across various projects.  

  

**Roles & Responsibilities**

* You will be responsible to prepare and maintain Preventive maintenance of all QC instruments and Equipment's through SAP
* Handlings of break downs in QC
* Coordinate with vendor and facilitate the required maintenance activity
* Supporting for installation of new instruments and Equipment's in Quality control
* Make sure availability of required spare parts for all instruments and equipment's available in QC
* Timely Execution and closure of Preventive maintenace activity as per schedule
* You will be responsible to collaborate with safety work streams to implement comprehensive safety standards that align with industry best practices.

  

**Qualifications** **Educational qualification:** BE/B.Tech in Mechanical / Electrical/ Instrumentation  

  

**Minimum work experience:** 6-8 years of experience

title: Calibration Engineer
description:
**Job Title: Calibration and Testing Engineer (Civil/Mechanical)**

**Position Type:** Full-Time

**About Us:**

Shree Trading Company, a leading NABL (National Accreditation Board for Testing and Calibration Laboratories) accredited Calibration and Testing Laboratory, is seeking a dedicated and experienced Calibration and Testing Engineer to join our team. As a key player in quality assurance and reliability testing, we are committed to delivering precision and excellence in all our projects.

**Job Overview:**

We are looking for a highly motivated and skilled Civil/Mechanical Engineer to perform site calibration and laboratory testing activities in accordance with NABL standards. The successful candidate will be responsible for ensuring the accuracy and reliability of measurements and test results, contributing to the quality and safety of products and systems.

**Key Responsibilities:**

**On-Site Calibration:**Perform calibration of civil and mechanical instruments and equipment at client sites.  
Ensure compliance with NABL standards and guidelines throughout the calibration process.  
Maintain detailed records of calibration procedures and results.  
Troubleshoot and rectify any calibration issues to maintain accuracy.

**Lab Testing:**Conduct various mechanical and civil engineering tests in the laboratory environment.  
Prepare and set up test specimens and equipment as per project requirements.  
Monitor and document testing procedures and outcomes, ensuring data accuracy.  
Collaborate with other team members to conduct comprehensive tests.

**Qualifications:**

* Bachelor's degree in Civil Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, or a related field.
* Proficiency in operating and maintaining a wide range of civil and mechanical instruments and equipment.
* Detail-oriented with a strong commitment to accuracy and precision.

title: Design Engineer
description:
We are Designers & Manufacturers of Special Purpose Machines having our Office & Works in Chikhali, Pune - Maharashtra.

To aid our growth, we are looking for Four Mechanical Design Engineer Trainees – Freshers with Bachelor in Mechanical Engineering of 2021 or 2022 or 2023 batch with around **one or two years’ experience in Solidedge** - to be trained on the following activities. Formal training on Solid Modeling Software in a reputed institute will be an advantage - but self trained candidates proficient in Solid Modeling & doing regular practice will also be considered.

**Candidates with more experience especially in SPM design, please mention in the covering letter so that they can be considered for Sr. Engineer positions.**

The Candidates MUST have, apart from high proficiency in Solid Modeling using Solidedge & regular practice of the software - good theoretical knowledge in Mechanical Design & good grasping power & retention capability.

The Training during 12 months will comprise of

* Study of the design input details and prepare the concept.
* Preparation of Bill of Materials, Costing sheet.
* Making the detailed 3D model on Solidedge
* Prepare the Manufacturing drawings in 2D with complete processing details
* Test the machine, assembled by the Production team, verify the performance and validate the parameters.
* Undertake the inspection by customers / third party, take down the improvement points, carryout the improvements

During the 12 months training period, the candidates will be paid a Stipend of Rs. 14,000 to Rs. 17,000 per month based on their proficiency.

Candidates who have successfully completed the training will be absorbed in the company as Senior Design Engineers at salaries ranging from Rs. 18,000/- to Rs. 22,000/- per month based on their proficiency.

We invite Engineers (2022 - 2023 pass out) with good grasping power, communication skills & passion to learn engineering skills to apply. PEOPLE WHO HAD ALREADY APPLIED NEED NOT APPLY AGAIN.

The Candidates MUST have an aptitude for learning the following.

* Study of the drawings, assembly of machines, their functioning.
* Inward inspection, Vendor site inspection.
* Inspection of Machined components for dimensions, quality & quantity & clear for production.
* Preparation of the Inspection Documents on the ERP system & clear the GRN for issue to production.
* Traveling within city & outstation for Stage inspection, follow up at Vendors’ premises.
* Test the machine, assembled by the Production team, verify the performance and validate the parameters.
* Undertake the inspection by customers / third party, take down the improvement points.

Please apply mentioning your Qualification, experience, residential address in Pune.

Thanks & regards

title: Design Engineer
description:
**Position Title** *QDesign Engineer I* **Job family** Product Development, R & D

**Reports to** Product Development Lead **Location** Vadodara, Gujarat

**Pay Grade** 2.4-3.6 LPA **Updated on**  09.06.2022

**Summary**:  
Junior Design Engineers will work with the design team and assist them for different technical tasks. With this position, Junior design engineers will learn strategic approaches to carry out designing tasks. To be a successful mechanical design engineer, you should be mathematically and mechanically minded and have strong analytical and critical thinking abilities. A top-notch mechanical design engineer should possess detailed knowledge of engineering and design principles and be able to find creative solutions to technical problems.

**Duties & Responsibilities**

* Technical Assistance - S/He will have to work closely with the design team and execute tasks as per their instructions. Meeting with design teams to determine mechanical applications and requirements.
* Investigate problems, analyze root causes and derive resolutions.
* Conducting research to inform the design and engineering methods required for the mechanical systems.
* Planning and executing mechanical designs using CAD, CAM, and 3D CAD programs.
* Create detailed drawings and Bills of Materials for mechanical components and assemblies.
* Performing computer simulations and experiments to virtually test and refine the designs.
* Preparing technical reports, design specifications documents, and operational manuals.
* Managing project timelines, resources, and budgets.
* Documentation and Record keeping.
* Design work is typically office based, however you'll go on visits to Site and plant will also be required.
* Moderate traveling required as per tasks.

**Requirement**

* **Education** : Bachelor in mechanical engineering.
* **Must Needed** : IT and CAD knowledge
* A minimum of **1 years** of experience as a mechanical design engineer.
* Proficiency with engineering design programs such as Solid works, AutoCAD, Creo.

Solidworks will be preferable.

* Strong math and IT skills
* Undertake complex calculations
* Design the aesthetics, materials and functionality of components
* **Skill & Knowledge**  o A creative flair and design ability o Hands-on experience in basic engineering skills. o Able to work in a strict timeline. o Strong organizational and persuasive skills. o Attentive to detail and critically minded. o Good verbal and communication skills o Good visual and spatial awareness

o Time management and organizational skills o Excellent project management skills

**We would like to highlight following notes associated with this position**

* Selected candidates have to join the company as on probation period for 6 months followed by a full-time job for at least 1 year. There is a bond for a stipulated period and you have to submit the cheques.

Functional Head-Cost Engineering,

The Cost Engineering function "part cost engineering" is responsible for the cost management of all Global brand trucks, locations and projects within the KION group.

Costs are determined, evaluated, and optimized over the entire product life cycle with a focus on the development process.

The function is anchored at all ‘Industrial trucks and Services’ global development locations.

title: Design Engineer
description:
As a HVAC Design & Sales Engineer, you will play a pivotal role in bridging the gap between technical expertise and customer engagement. You will be responsible for creating innovative designs, developing technical solutions, and effectively communicating these solutions to potential clients. Your role will involve collaborating closely with sales teams, engineers, and clients to understand project requirements, propose suitable solutions, and ensure successful project delivery. This position requires a blend of engineering proficiency, creative design skills, and strong sales acumen.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* **Design Development:**
* Utilize engineering principles and software tools to develop innovative designs and technical solutions.
* Collaborate with clients and internal teams to understand project requirements, specifications, and constraints.
* Generate detailed drawings, schematics, and specifications for proposed designs.
* Ensure designs comply with industry standards, regulations, and best practices.
* **Sales Support:**
* Work closely with the sales team to identify client needs and opportunities for technical solutions.
* Provide technical expertise and support during client meetings, presentations, and negotiations.
* Develop comprehensive proposals, cost estimates, and timelines for potential projects.
* Address technical inquiries and concerns from clients, offering solutions and recommendations as needed.
* **Project Management:**
* Coordinate with engineering, production, and logistics teams to ensure seamless project execution.
* Monitor project progress, timelines, and budgets to meet client expectations and company objectives.
* Conduct regular project reviews and identify opportunities for optimization and improvement.
* Act as a liaison between clients and internal teams, facilitating effective communication and resolving any issues that may arise.
* **Customer Relationship Management:**
* Cultivate strong relationships with clients by providing exceptional service, support, and expertise.
* Understand client needs, preferences, and feedback to tailor solutions and enhance customer satisfaction.
* Identify opportunities for upselling or cross-selling additional products or services to existing clients.
* **Market Research and Innovation:**
* Stay abreast of industry trends, technological advancements, and competitive landscape.
* Conduct market research to identify emerging opportunities and potential areas for product development.
* Contribute to the innovation and improvement of existing products or processes based on market insights and customer feedback.

**Qualifications and Skills:**

* Bachelor's degree in Engineering (Mechanical, Electrical, or related field).
* Proven experience in engineering design, sales, or a related field.
* Proficiency in CAD software (e.g., AutoCAD, SolidWorks) and other relevant engineering tools.
* Strong technical aptitude and problem-solving skills.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities.
* Demonstrated sales or customer service experience preferred.
* Project management experience is a plus.
* Ability to work independently and collaborate effectively in a team environment.

Job Type: Full-time

Salary: ₹10,000.00 - ₹45,000.00 per month

Education:

* Bachelor's (Preferred)

Experience:

* total work: 1 year (Required)

Work Location: In person

title: Mechanical Engineer
description:
Do you have a passion for innovative ideas and groundbreaking discoveries? With over $1 billion invested annually in R&D, at Thermo Fisher Scientific you’ll help solve some of the world’s toughest challenges, from giving cancer patients hope, ensuring safe drinking water and helping law enforcement tackle cases through forensics. We empower our teams to put science into meaningful action and give our R&D colleagues the autonomy, resources and tools they need to take science a step beyond.

**Location/Division Specific Information**
IEC / LPD Division


Discover Impactful Work:
Creative Mechanical Engineer to work on all product lifecycle development stages from Research to Manufacture


A day in the Life:* Work with Global R&D design team to develop conceptual design, detailed design and drawings in Solid Works using the industry best design practices and design standards.
* Develop detailed 2D drawings, adhering to ASME Y14 drawing standards and applying GD&T & Design for Manufacturability principles.
* Complete responsibility for the development of 3D models, Drawings, Bill Of Materials and taking them through the Drawing release process and manufacturing.
* Support in design documentation & artifact presentation as per design process.
* Continuously learns and grow technical depth and knowledge across product lines.
* Identify and contribute to Knowledge management opportunities for the products assigned with through guidance & mentorship


Keys to Success:**Education & Professional Qualifications*** Bachelor’s degree in Mechanical Engineering or equivalent.
* 2 – 4 years’ experience in using SolidWorks for the development of 3D models and drawings

**Knowledge, Skills, Abilities*** Strong fundamentals on Engineering basics, design for manufacturability, ASME Y14 drawing standards & GD&T
* Understanding of basic manufacturing processes like Plastic injection moulding, Sheet metal, Casting, Welding, Forging and relevant standards like ASME, AWS, and DIN.
* Proficient in PDM and PLM systems.
* Strong analytical and critical thinking skills.
* Excellent communication and people skills.
* Experience working with Global Team is a must
* Ability to work independently and as part of a team.


Our Mission is to enable our customers to make the world healthier, cleaner and safer. Watch as our colleagues explain 5 reasons to work with us. A one team of 100,000+ colleagues, we share a common set of values - Integrity, Intensity, Innovation and Involvement - working together to accelerate research, solve complex scientific challenges, drive technological innovation and support patients in need. #StartYourStory at Thermo Fisher Scientific, where diverse experiences, backgrounds and perspectives are valued.


Apply today!
Thermo Fisher Scientific is an EEO/Affirmative Action Employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status, disability or any other legally protected status.


Accessibility/Disability Access
Job Seekers with a Disability: Thermo Fisher Scientific offers accessibility service for job seekers requiring accommodations in the job application process. For example, this may include individuals requiring assistance because of hearing, vision, mobility, or cognitive impairments. If you are a job seeker with a disability, or assisting a person with a disability, and require accessibility assistance or an accommodation to apply for one of our jobs, please submit a request by telephone at 1-855-471-2255\\*. Please include your contact information and specific details about your required accommodation to support you during the job application process.

* This telephone line is reserved solely for job seekers with disabilities requiring accessibility assistance or an accommodation in the job application process. Messages left for other purposes, such as not being able to get into the career website, following up on an application, or other non-disability related technical issues will not receive a response
